text: Hi guys, I'm Laura Vitale.

Your going to need some self rising flour,
some buttermilk, really cold vegetable shortening

and unsalted butter, baking powder, baking
soda, salt, and a little bit of melted butter.

Now you need to work quickly and you need
to make sure your ingredients your fat anyway

and your milk is very very cold, otherwise

always have.
